articles.title: Brett Moffitt opens up on ‘painful’ recovery, karting, getting ready for Darlington and Charlotte - NASCAR
articles.description: After fracturing both legs in March, Gander Trucks star Brett Moffitt talks about his recovery and preparation for racing at Darlington and Charlotte.
articles.content:
